title: Execution counts in sort method - determine result

content.question: Assume that sort is called with the array {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}. How many times will the expression indicated by /* Compare values */ and the statement indicated by /* Assign to temp */ execute?

choices.label: /* Compare values *//* Assign to temp */15 times5 times
/* Compare values *//* Assign to temp */15 times6 times
/* Compare values *//* Assign to temp */21 times5 times
/* Compare values *//* Assign to temp */21 times6 times

content.answer: /* Compare values *//* Assign to temp */15 times5 times

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
